util_plot

Plot a Raster* object with the NLMR default theme

util_plot(x, scale = "A", discrete = FALSE, legendposition = "bottom",
  legendtitle = "Z")

Arguments

x

[Raster* object]
scale

[character(1)] Five options are available: "viridis - magma" (= "A", the default option), "viridis - inferno" (= "B"), "viridis - plasma" (= "C"), "viridis - viridis" (= "D")
discrete

[logical(1)] If TRUE, the function plots a raster with a discrete legend.
legendposition

[character(1)] The position of legends ("none", "left", "right", "bottom", "top")
legendtitle

[character(1)] Title for legend

Value

ggplot2 Object

Examples


# With continuous data
nlm_raster <- nlm_random(10,10)
util_plot(nlm_raster, scale = "D")

# With classified data
y <- c(0.5, 0.15, 0.25)
nlm_raster <- util_classify(nlm_raster, y)
util_plot(nlm_raster, scale = "D", discrete = TRUE)
